title: Expert Systems
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
Old school AI. Emulating a human expert using If-Then rules. 
Reliable and explainable, but brittle (can't handle edge cases outside rules).

examples.code: MYCIN (1970s): Diagnosed blood infections better than junior doctors.

interview_questions.question: Limit of Expert Systems?
interview_questions.answer: Knowledge Acquisition Bottleneck (Hard to encode expert intuition). Brittle.
